2077790.name: Cyb3r_Technologies Test page
2077790.description:
Hack your way out of a government-controlled city in this game Firewall! This game follows a group of hackers, Issac, James, and Zach as they work their way out of the city. On their way to a connection point, they get attacked by the anti-rebellious forces! As they get back, they realize that James was taken away! You have to help them hack their way to finding out where James is in a Third Person Shooter style format to help them free the entire city; or just yourselves!
The game can be played either in first or third person and on a keyboard or controller!

This game is made in Unreal Engine 5, and is a fun project I started because I was bored!
2077790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
